createcredentiallocker.name: CreateCredentialLocker
createcredentiallocker.description: Grants permission to create a product credential locker. This operation will trigger the creation of all the manufacturing resources including Wi-Fi setup key pair and device certificate

createdestination.name: CreateDestination
createdestination.description: Grants permission to create a destination

createeventlogconfiguration.name: CreateEventLogConfiguration
createeventlogconfiguration.description: Grants permission to set the event log configuration for the account, a resource type, or a specific resource

createmanagedthing.name: CreateManagedThing
createmanagedthing.description: Grants permission to create a Managed Thing

createnotificationconfiguration.name: CreateNotificationConfiguration
createnotificationconfiguration.description: Grants permission to create a notification configuration

createotatask.name: CreateOtaTask
createotatask.description: Grants permission to customers to create an OTA task to update their devices

createotataskconfiguration.name: CreateOtaTaskConfiguration
createotataskconfiguration.description: Grants permission to create an OTA task configuration

createprovisioningprofile.name: CreateProvisioningProfile
createprovisioningprofile.description: Grants permission to create a new provisioning profile

deletecredentiallocker.name: DeleteCredentialLocker
deletecredentiallocker.description: Grants permission to delete a Credential Locker. This operation cannot be undone and any existing device won't be able to use the IoT managed integrations Setup

deletedestination.name: DeleteDestination
deletedestination.description: Grants permission to delete a destination

deleteeventlogconfiguration.name: DeleteEventLogConfiguration
deleteeventlogconfiguration.description: Grants permission to delete an event log configuration by log configuration ID

deletemanagedthing.name: DeleteManagedThing
deletemanagedthing.description: Grants permission to delete a managed thing. If a Controller is deleted, all the devices connected to it will have their status changed to pending. Note, it is not possible to remove a Cloud device

deletenotificationconfiguration.name: DeleteNotificationConfiguration
deletenotificationconfiguration.description: Grants permission to delete a notification configuration

deleteotatask.name: DeleteOtaTask
deleteotatask.description: Grants permission to delete an OTA task

deleteotataskconfiguration.name: DeleteOtaTaskConfiguration
deleteotataskconfiguration.description: Grants permission to delete a OTA task configuration

deleteprovisioningprofile.name: DeleteProvisioningProfile
deleteprovisioningprofile.description: Grants permission to delete a provisioning Profile

getcredentiallocker.name: GetCredentialLocker
getcredentiallocker.description: Grants permission to get an existing Credential Locker information

getcustomendpoint.name: GetCustomEndpoint
getcustomendpoint.description: Grants permission to customers to retrieve the custom endpoint address

getdefaultencryptionconfiguration.name: GetDefaultEncryptionConfiguration
getdefaultencryptionconfiguration.description: Grants permission to get a connector by AWS ARN

getdestination.name: GetDestination
getdestination.description: Grants permission to get a destination

getdevicediscovery.name: GetDeviceDiscovery
getdevicediscovery.description: Grants permission to get the current state of a device discovery

geteventlogconfiguration.name: GetEventLogConfiguration
geteventlogconfiguration.description: Grants permission to get an event log configuration by log configuration ID

gethubconfiguration.name: GetHubConfiguration
gethubconfiguration.description: Grants permission to get hub configuration

getmanagedthing.name: GetManagedThing
getmanagedthing.description: Grants permission to get a managed thing

getmanagedthingcapabilities.name: GetManagedThingCapabilities
getmanagedthingcapabilities.description: Grants permission to get capabilities by ManagedThingId

getmanagedthingconnectivitydata.name: GetManagedThingConnectivityData
getmanagedthingconnectivitydata.description: Grants permission to get the connectivity status of a Managed Thing

getmanagedthingmetadata.name: GetManagedThingMetaData
getmanagedthingmetadata.description: Grants permission to get metaData info by ManagedThingId

getmanagedthingstate.name: GetManagedThingState
getmanagedthingstate.description: Grants permission to get managed thing states by managed thing id

getnotificationconfiguration.name: GetNotificationConfiguration
getnotificationconfiguration.description: Grants permission to get a notification configuration

getotatask.name: GetOtaTask
getotatask.description: Grants permission to get the Ota task

getotataskconfiguration.name: GetOtaTaskConfiguration
getotataskconfiguration.description: Grants permission to get an OTA task configuration

getprovisioningprofile.name: GetProvisioningProfile
getprovisioningprofile.description: Grants permission to get an existing provisioning profile information

getruntimelogconfiguration.name: GetRuntimeLogConfiguration
getruntimelogconfiguration.description: Grants permission to get runtime log configuration for a specific managed thing or for all managed things as a group

getschemaversion.name: GetSchemaVersion
getschemaversion.description: Grants permission to get a schema version with the provided information

listcredentiallockers.name: ListCredentialLockers
listcredentiallockers.description: Grants permission to list the existing Credential Locker

listdestinations.name: ListDestinations
listdestinations.description: Grants permission to list all the destinations

listeventlogconfigurations.name: ListEventLogConfigurations
listeventlogconfigurations.description: Grants permission to list all event log configurations for account

listmanagedthingschemas.name: ListManagedThingSchemas
listmanagedthingschemas.description: Grants permission to list Schemas Associated With Managed Thing

listmanagedthings.name: ListManagedThings
listmanagedthings.description: Grants permission to list all the managed things

listnotificationconfigurations.name: ListNotificationConfigurations
listnotificationconfigurations.description: Grants permission to list all the notification configurations

listotataskconfigurations.name: ListOtaTaskConfigurations
listotataskconfigurations.description: Grants permission to list all the OTA task configurations

listotataskexecutions.name: ListOtaTaskExecutions
listotataskexecutions.description: Grants permission to list all the Ota task executions

listotatasks.name: ListOtaTasks
listotatasks.description: Grants permission to list all the OTA tasks

listprovisioningprofiles.name: ListProvisioningProfiles
listprovisioningprofiles.description: Grants permission to list the existing provisioning profile

listschemaversions.name: ListSchemaVersions
listschemaversions.description: Grants permission to list schema versions with the provided information

putdefaultencryptionconfiguration.name: PutDefaultEncryptionConfiguration
putdefaultencryptionconfiguration.description: Grants permission to associate KMS key with IoT managed integrations

puthubconfiguration.name: PutHubConfiguration
puthubconfiguration.description: Grants permission to update a hub configuration

putruntimelogconfiguration.name: PutRuntimeLogConfiguration
putruntimelogconfiguration.description: Grants permission to set the runtime log configuration for a specific managed thing or for all managed  things as a group

registercustomendpoint.name: RegisterCustomEndpoint
registercustomendpoint.description: Grants permission to customers to request us to manage the server trust for them or bring their own external server trusts for the custom domain

resetruntimelogconfiguration.name: ResetRuntimeLogConfiguration
resetruntimelogconfiguration.description: Grants permission to reset a runtime log configuration for a specific managed thing or for all managed things as a group

sendmanagedthingcommand.name: SendManagedThingCommand
sendmanagedthingcommand.description: Grants permission to use the SendManagedThingCommand API to send commands to managed things

startdevicediscovery.name: StartDeviceDiscovery
startdevicediscovery.description: Grants permission to request to start device discovery

updatedestination.name: UpdateDestination
updatedestination.description: Grants permission to update a destination

updateeventlogconfiguration.name: UpdateEventLogConfiguration
updateeventlogconfiguration.description: Grants permission to update an event log configuration by log configuration ID

updatemanagedthing.name: UpdateManagedThing
updatemanagedthing.description: Grants permission to update a managed thing

updatenotificationconfiguration.name: UpdateNotificationConfiguration
updatenotificationconfiguration.description: Grants permission to update a notification configuration

updateotatask.name: UpdateOtaTask
updateotatask.description: Grants permission to update an OTA Task
